description: When you rock this super comfy polyester cotton blend long-sleeve tee, you're rocking a piece of Marmot's 50 year history. A tagline that's been with us since the very beginning, "Marmot For Life" embodies our commitment to keeping you comfortable for the longhaul. This long-sleeve t-shirt is no exception. Poolside or mountainside, skate park to state park, this tee is ready for low key or high octane summer adventure. From hot beach days to cool alpine nights with a flannel overtop, this tee is ready to hang ten before, during, and after the fun.
name: Marmot Marmot For Life Tee LS - Mens
